CVXPY
Minimize
  Sum(x[0], None, False)
Subject To
Bounds
 0.0 <= x
End
----------------------------------------
AFTER COMPILATION
Minimize
  C0
Subject To
 R0: - C0 <= 0
 R1: - C1 <= 0
Bounds
 C0 free
 C1 free
End
----------------------------------------
GUROBI
Minimize
  x[0] + 0 x[1]
Subject To
Bounds
End
